name: Orbeater
description:
Orbeater Control Button/KeyFeature<arrow-keys> / <W-A-S-D-keys>
Hitting orbs at the corresponding place
<esc>Open/Close the pause menu

Songs
  • Egypt (feat. Prince M)
  • joining the loop
  • Excited
  • Machdashauskaputt feat. Narkoleptikk
  • Sangria Underground (feat. Prince M)
  • Pulse
  • Nightshift
Credits 

I (Tch1b0) made the game as an entry for the Godot Wild Jam #46.

Noisetäter made the music that was used in this game.

  • Tch1b0      (Github, itch.io)
  • Noisetäter (SoundCloud)
  • Narkoleptikk (SoundCloud)
Choice of the name

In the game, you are beating orbs. So my first Idea of a name was "Orb beater",

But I soon realized that it is hard to pronounce, as there are two "b"s next to each other. So I merged the "b"s and got a unique name.
